options.content:
# Containers from deprecated registries

Our goal is to phase out the use of `quay.io/giantswarm/` and `docker.io/giantswarm` for container images. This dashboards shows aggregated data about containers created through images from deprecated registries.

Note the filter options above. The **Image** filter allows to enter a substring of an image identifier, to narrow down the dashboard data to a particular image.

For more information about the individual images and containers, you can also follow the links on the installation names to jump into a dashboard for that installation.

[Related GitHub issue](https://github.com/giantswarm/roadmap/issues/3935)
